meanings.definition: Bedrugs (verb): to cover or fill with rugs for a bed
meanings.sent1: She carefully bedrugs her bed to make it cozy.
meanings.sent2: Every night, she bedrugs her bed with soft blankets.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly bedrugs his bed with so many rugs, it looks like a carpet store.
meanings.sent4: The lovebirds bedrugs their nest with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The act of bedrugging the room transformed it into a snug haven.

meanings.definition: Bedrugs (noun): rugs used on a bed
meanings.sent1: The fluffy bedrugs added a touch of luxury to the room.
meanings.sent2: She bought new bedrugs to match the color scheme of her bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to nap on the bedrugs instead of the floor.
meanings.sent4: The bedrugs, like a soft cloud, cradled her to sleep every night.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the bedrugs brought life to the room.
